abstract: Telefonica of Spain and Portugal Telecom are battling for control of their Brazilian wireless joint venture in a tussle that could determine which of the flagship companies realizes its global ambitions.
snippet: Telefonica of Spain and Portugal Telecom are battling for control of their Brazilian wireless joint venture in a tussle that could determine which of the flagship companies realizes its global ambitions.
lead_paragraph: Telefónica of Spain and Portugal Telecom are battling for control of their Brazilian wireless joint venture in a tussle that could determine which of the flagship companies realizes its global ambitions.

headline.main: Iberian Telecoms Tussle Over Dynamic Brazil
